text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the model to outline the mechanism of Article 267 TFEU (preliminary ruling procedure) as an available legal framework when a dispute reaches the CoJ. The candidate answer mentions the judicial route: \"National courts first: Challenge the bill via Luxembourg courts, asking for a preliminary reference to the CJEU (Luxembourg's constitutional court or admin court).\" While this correctly describes the *process* of initiating a preliminary reference (which leads to the CJEU interpreting EU law under Art. 267 TFEU), it fails to explicitly name or reference Article 267 TFEU itself, as required by the criterion.", "criterion_id": "7724d864-ff7e-4dc2-8e9f-5379339a9dbe"}
